code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{supabase}from"./supabase";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Login(_ref){let{onLogin}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[error,setError]=useState("");const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const{data,error}=await supabase.from("users").select("*").eq("username",username).eq("password",password).single();if(error||!data){setError("Invalid credentials");}else{onLogin({username:data.username,role:data.role});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center items-center h-screen",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,className:"bg-white p-6 rounded shadow-md space-y-4 w-80",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold text-center",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"w-full border px-3 py-2 rounded",type:"text",placeholder:"Username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"w-full border px-3 py-2 rounded",type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-red-500 text-sm",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"bg-blue-600 text-white px-4 py-2 w-full rounded",children:"Log In"})]})});}
